duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and process merchandise, including pricing and ticketing, and meeting minimum quota for assigned department.
Safeguard company property, including donated goods, and report any incidents of theft, misappropriation, or unauthorized possession of company property.
Assist customers on the sales floor with questions or concerns, and maintain organized and safe workstations.
Follow safety rules and ensure all safety equipment is used, taking action and/or reporting any unsafe or potential hazards.
May be cross-trained as a Retail Sales Associate, and perform other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Ability to speak and read English proficiently and be at least 18 years of age or older. Ability to pass a background check and drug screen, where applicable for position.
